lines.transliteration_english: Kab Laagai Masataki Charanan Raja , Darasu Daiaa Drigan Kab Daykhau ?

Shabad OS B.translation: When will my forehead be anointed with the holy dust of the feet of True Guru and when will I see the clement and merciful face of the True Guru with my own eyes?

lines.transliteration_english: Anmrit Bachan Sounau Kab Sravanana , Kab Rasanaa Baynatee Bisaykhau ?

Shabad OS B.translation: When will I hear the sweet ambrosial-like and elixir-giving words of my True Guru with my own ears? When will I be able to make a humble supplication of my distress with my own tongue before him?

lines.transliteration_english: Kab Kar Karau Dandaout Bandanaa , Pagan Parikramaadi Poun Raykhau ?

Shabad OS B.translation: When will I be able to lie prostrate like a staff before my True Guru and salute him with folded hands? When will I be able to employ my feet in the circumambulation of my True Guru?
